text: The Nagoya University of Foreign Studies is in Nisshin, Aichi Prefecture, Japan. it started in 1988. It mainly teachs languages, but also has a strong emphasis on Japanese culture. It has 4 main schools: # Japanese Language Institute # Graduate School # School of Foreign Languages # School of Contemporary International Studies ==Other websites== * Nagoya Universtity of Foreign Studies website ==References== Category:Colleges and universities in Japan Category:1988 establishments in Japan Category:Nagoya
title: Nagoya University of Foreign Studies
